@RWIG_Peter: All you need to do is copy and paste those folders (Assets, Contents etc) to your Railworks Folder. Your Railworks folder will already contain those folders, all you are doing is adding new files to them. If it asks you whether you want to overwrite anything inside the folders, just answer Yes. 

An .rwp file is just a zip file  anyway, I sometimes find it quicker to open the .rwp file in winzip/7zip/winrar and just copy and paste the folders into my Railworks directory.
